name: Feature Canvas Notion Template!
description: All the information you need, on a single page!Feature Canvas is a tool that helps you visualize, prioritize, and communicate the insights behind the features in a clear and concise way. The purpose of using Feature Canvas is to create a shared understanding among stakeholders about what features have been selected for development and the reasoning & data behind them.
